verses.verse: וְאֵ֣לֶּה׀ <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei Now these [are] the kings הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, of the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הִכּ֤וּ <S%H5221><s%> hik-Ku smote בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- which the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וַיִּֽרְשׁ֣וּ <S%H3423><s%> vai-yir-Shu and possessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַרְצָ֔ם <S%H776><s%> 'ar-Tzam, their land בְּעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den Jordan מִזְרְחָ֣ה <S%H4217><s%> miz-re-Chah toward the rising הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-Sha-mesh; of the sun מִנַּ֤חַל <S%H5158><s%> min-Na-chal from the river אַרְנוֹן֙ <S%H769><s%> 'ar-nOn Arnon עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> har unto mount חֶרְמ֔וֹן <S%H2768><s%> cher-Mon, Hermon וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הָעֲרָבָ֖ה <S%H6160><s%> ha-'a-ra-Vah and all the plain מִזְרָֽחָה׃ <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah. on the east

סִיחוֹן֙ <S%H5511><s%> si-chOn Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites הַיּוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-Shev who dwelt בְּחֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <S%H2809><s%> be-chesh-Bon; in Heshbon מֹשֵׁ֡ל <S%H4910><s%> mo-Shel [and] ruled מֵעֲרוֹעֵ֡ר <S%H6177><s%> me-'a-ro-'Er from Aroer אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is on שְׂפַת־ <S%H8193><s%> se-fat- which [is] upon the bank נַ֨חַל <S%H5158><s%> Na-chal of the river אַרְנ֜וֹן <S%H769><s%> ar-Non Arnon וְת֤וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> ve-Toch and from the middle הַנַּ֙חַל֙ <S%H5158><s%> han-Na-chal of the river וַחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> va-cha-Tzi and from half הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> hag-gil-'Ad, Gilead וְעַד֙ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'Ad far יַבֹּ֣ק <S%H2999><s%> yab-Bok Jabbok הַנַּ֔חַל <S%H5158><s%> han-Na-chal, even unto the river גְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul [which is] the border בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon. of Ammon

וְהָעֲרָבָה֩ <S%H6160><s%> ve-ha-'a-ra-Vah And from the plain עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far יָ֨ם <S%H3220><s%> yam to the sea כִּנְר֜וֹת <S%H3672><s%> kin-Rot of Chinneroth מִזְרָ֗חָה <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah, on the east וְ֠עַד <S%H5704><s%> Ve-'ad far יָ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> yam and unto the sea הָעֲרָבָ֤ה <S%H6160><s%> ha-'a-ra-Vah of the plain יָם־ <S%H3220><s%> yom- sea הַמֶּ֙לַח֙ <S%H4417><s%> ham-Me-lach [even] the salt מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah, on the east דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech the way בֵּ֣ית beit הַיְשִׁמ֑וֹת <S%H1020><s%> hay-shi-Mot; to Bethjeshimoth וּמִ֨תֵּימָ֔ן <S%H8486><s%> u-Mit-tei-Man, and from the south תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat the foot אַשְׁדּ֥וֹת <S%H794><s%> ash-Dot of the slopes הַפִּסְגָּֽה׃ <S%H6449><s%> hap-pis-Gah. of Pisgah

וּגְב֗וּל <S%H1366><s%> u-ge-Vul, And the coast ע֚וֹג <S%H5747><s%> og of Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan, of Bashan מִיֶּ֖תֶר <S%H3499><s%> mi-Ye-ter [which was] of the remnant הָרְפָאִ֑ים <S%H7497><s%> ha-re-fa-'Im; of the giants הַיּוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-Shev that dwelt בְּעַשְׁתָּר֖וֹת <S%H6252><s%> be-'ash-ta-Rot at Ashtaroth וּבְאֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <S%H154><s%> u-ve-'ed-Re-'i. and at Edrei

וּ֠מֹשֵׁל <S%H4910><s%> U-mo-shel And reigned בְּהַ֨ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har in mount חֶרְמ֤וֹן <S%H2768><s%> cher-Mon Hermon וּבְסַלְכָה֙ <S%H5548><s%> u-ve-sal-Chah and in Salcah וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol and all הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan, and in all Bashan עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul unto the border הַגְּשׁוּרִ֖י <S%H1651><s%> hag-ge-shu-Ri of the Geshurites וְהַמַּעֲכָתִ֑י <S%H4602><s%> ve-ham-ma-'a-cha-Ti; and the Maachathites וַחֲצִי֙ <S%H2677><s%> va-cha-Tzi and half הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> hag-gil-'Ad, Gilead גְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul the border סִיח֥וֹן <S%H5511><s%> si-Chon of Sihon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king חֶשְׁבּֽוֹן׃ <S%H2809><s%> chesh-Bon. of Heshbon

מֹשֶׁ֧ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Them did Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> 'e-ved- the servant יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel הִכּ֑וּם <S%H5221><s%> hik-Kum; smite וַֽ֠יִּתְּנָהּ <S%H5414><s%> Vai-yit-te-nah gave מֹשֶׁ֨ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh and Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> 'e-ved- the servant יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God יְרֻשָּׁ֗ה <S%H3425><s%> ye-rush-Shah, it [for] a possession לָרֻֽאוּבֵנִי֙ <S%H7206><s%> la-ru-'u-ve-Ni unto the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֔י <S%H1425><s%> ve-lag-ga-Di, and the Gadites וְלַחֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> ve-la-cha-Tzi and the half שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> She-vet tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> Ham-nash-Sheh. of Manasseh ס sa-Mek

וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei And these [are] the kings הָאָ֡רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the country אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הִכָּ֨ה <S%H5221><s%> hik-Kah smote יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' which Joshua וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel בְּעֵ֤בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver on this side הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den Jordan יָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah, on the west מִבַּ֤עַל mib-Ba-'al גָּד֙ <S%H1171><s%> gad from Baalgad בְּבִקְעַ֣ת <S%H1237><s%> be-vik-'At in the valley הַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <S%H3844><s%> hal-le-va-Non, of Lebanon וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- far הָהָ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har even unto the mount הֶחָלָ֖ק <S%H2510><s%> he-cha-Lak Halak הָעֹלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> ha-'o-Leh that goeth up שֵׂעִ֑ירָה <S%H8165><s%> se-'I-rah; to Seir וַיִּתְּנָ֨הּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nah gave יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' which Joshua לְשִׁבְטֵ֧י <S%H7626><s%> le-shiv-Tei unto the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel יְרֻשָּׁ֖ה <S%H3425><s%> ye-rush-Shah [for] a possession כְּמַחְלְקֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4256><s%> ke-mach-le-ko-Tam. according to their divisions

בָּהָ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> ba-Har In the mountains וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֗ה <S%H8219><s%> u-vash-she-fe-Lah, and in the valleys וּבָֽעֲרָבָה֙ <S%H6160><s%> u-va-'a-ra-Vah and in the plains וּבָ֣אֲשֵׁד֔וֹת <S%H794><s%> u-Va-'a-she-Dot, and in the springs וּבַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> u-vam-mid-Bar and in the wilderness וּבַנֶּ֑גֶב <S%H5045><s%> u-van-Ne-gev; and in the south country הַֽחִתִּי֙ <S%H2850><s%> ha-chit-Ti the Hittites הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, the Amorites וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> ve-hak-ke-na-'a-Ni and the Canaanites הַפְּרִזִּ֔י <S%H6522><s%> hap-pe-riz-Zi, the Perizzites הַחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> ha-chiv-Vi the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <S%H2983><s%> ve-hay-vu-Si. and the Jebusites פ Peh

מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king יְרִיח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> ye-ri-Cho of Jericho אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad; one מֶ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king הָעַ֛י <S%H5857><s%> ha-'Ai of Ai אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which מִצַּ֥ד <S%H6654><s%> mitz-Tzad which [is] beside בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> 'el Bethel אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king חֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> chev-Ron of Hebron אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king יַרְמוּת֙ <S%H3412><s%> yar-Mut of Jarmuth אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king לָכִ֖ישׁ <S%H3923><s%> la-Chish of Lachish אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king עֶגְלוֹן֙ <S%H5700><s%> 'eg-lOn of Eglon אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king גֶּ֖זֶר <S%H1507><s%> Ge-zer of Gezer אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king דְּבִר֙ <S%H1688><s%> de-Vir of Debir אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king גֶּ֖דֶר <S%H1445><s%> Ge-der of Geder אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king חָרְמָה֙ <S%H2767><s%> cha-re-Mah of Hormah אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king עֲרָ֖ד <S%H6166><s%> 'a-Rad of Arad אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king לִבְנָה֙ <S%H3841><s%> liv-Nah of Libnah אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king עֲדֻלָּ֖ם <S%H5725><s%> 'a-dul-Lam of Adullam אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king מַקֵּדָה֙ <S%H4719><s%> mak-ke-Dah of Makkedah אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> 'el of Bethel אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king תַּפּ֙וּחַ֙ <S%H8599><s%> tap-Pu-ach of Tappuah אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king חֵ֖פֶר <S%H2660><s%> Che-fer of Hepher אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king אֲפֵק֙ <S%H663><s%> 'a-Fek of Aphek אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king לַשָּׁר֖וֹן <S%H8289><s%> lash-sha-Ron of Lasharon אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king מָדוֹן֙ <S%H4068><s%> ma-dOn of Madon אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king חָצ֖וֹר <S%H2674><s%> cha-Tzor of Hazor אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king שִׁמְר֤וֹן shim-Ron מְראוֹן֙ <S%H8112><s%> me-r-'On of Shimronmeron אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king אַכְשָׁ֖ף <S%H407><s%> 'ach-Shaf of Achshaph אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king תַּעְנַךְ֙ <S%H8590><s%> ta'-naCh of Taanach אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king מְגִדּ֖וֹ <S%H4023><s%> me-gid-Do of Megiddo אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king קֶ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6943><s%> ke-desh of Kedesh אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, one מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- the king יָקְנֳעָ֥ם <S%H3362><s%> ya-ke-no-'Am of Jokneam לַכַּרְמֶ֖ל <S%H3760><s%> lak-kar-Mel of Carmel אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king דּ֛וֹר <S%H1756><s%> Dor of Dor לְנָפַ֥ת <S%H5299><s%> le-na-Fat in the coast דּ֖וֹר <S%H1756><s%> Dor of Dor אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad; one מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- the king גּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim of the nations לְגִלְגָּ֖ל <S%H1537><s%> le-gil-Gal of Gilgal אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. one

מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech The king תִּרְצָ֖ה <S%H8656><s%> tir-Tzah of Tirzah אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad; one כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim all the kings שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim thirty וְאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> ve-'e-Chad. and one פ Peh
